An '''arroba''' was a Spanish and Portuguese unit of weight, mass or volume. Its symbol is [[At sign|@]]. In weight it is equal to about 25 pounds.
An '''arroba''' was a Spanish and Portuguese unit of weight, mass or volume. Its symbol is [[At sign|@]]. In weight it is equal to about 25 pounds.

In the [[Spanish language]], the term ''arroba'' has now become synonymous with the symbol due to its use in [[e-mail address]]es.

Arroba is widely used in [[Brazil]] and other countries as weight unit for [[cattle]]
